Name: sot-sheikheliaskeke
Author: Sheikh Elias Keketso Lelia
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa (IDM)

Translations.Text: Le karolong ea bosiu, Mo khumamele, u Mo tlotlise bosiu bohle
Haele bana, ba rata bophelo ba lepotla-potla, ba itebatsa letsatsi le mahlonoko
Ke Rona ba ba hlotseng, Ra matlafatsa linoka tsa bona; empa, ha Re rata, Re ka ba fapanyetsana ka ba bang ba ts’oanang le bona
Sena ke temoso: ea ratang, a inkele tsela e eang ho Mong`a hae
Empa ha u ke ke, kantle ho thato ea Allah: hobane Allah U na le tsebo e phahametseng, U Seli
U tla amohela mohaung oa Hae ea ratoang ke eena; empa baetsalibe, – U ba hlophiselitse kahlolo e mahlonoko
Ka liphefo tse romelloang ka tatellano
Tse foqohang ka matla
Lijala hole le haufi
Li arole se seng ho se seng
Li phatlalatse molaetsa hoohle
Oa topollo kapa oa temoso
Ruri! Seo le se ts’episitsoeng se tla phethahala
Mohla linaleli li fifalang
Leholimo le petsoha ka lehare
Lithaba li qhalahangoa se ka lerole
Le baromuoa ba khobokang’oang pallong ea bona –
Ke letsatsi lefe la tsee tse boleloang
Ke tsa Letsatsi la Tlhopho
Ke`ng se tla le hlalosetsa hore na letsatsi la tharollo ke eng! –
Sekhobo se be ho balatoli ba ‘nete letsatsing leo
Ha Re ea ka Ra ripitlila meloko ea mathomo
Le ka e latelang ho moo Re tla etsa joalo
Re sebetsa joalo ka baetsalibe
Sekhobo se be ho balatoli ba ‘nete letsatsing leo
